{"id":1308986385,"question_id":72,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1720070853,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"10 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1308986385/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"11.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string w1, string w2) {\n        int n=w1.size();\n        int m=w2.size();\n        vector<vector<int>>dp(n+1,vector<int>(m+1,0));\n        dp[0][0]=0;\n        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){\n            dp[i][0]=i;\n        }\n        for(int j=1;j<=m;j++){\n            dp[0][j]=j;\n        }\n        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){\n            for(int j=1;j<=m;j++){\n                if(w1[i-1]==w2[j-1]){\n                    dp[i][j]=dp[i-1][j-1];\n                }\n                else{\n                    dp[i][j]=1+min({dp[i-1][j],dp[i][j-1],dp[i-1][j-1]});\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return dp[n][m];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
